text.autoconfig.spell_engine.title: Spell Engine
text.autoconfig.spell_engine.option.clie: Automatically release spell when fully charged
Show target name when more than one entity is being targeted
Render glowing effect on targeted entity
Immediately cancel currently casted spell and restart casting in case switching
Use the color of the magic school for glowing effect on targeted entity
Only show spell or item hotbar based on which one is focused
Switch to using spell hotbar when attempting to use a spell caster weapon
Switch to back to item hotbar pressing ESC key
gui.spell_engine.spell_binding.title: Bind Spells
spell.spell_engine.arcane_missile.name: Arcane Missile
spell.spell_engine.arcane_missile.descri: Shoots a bolt of energy, causing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.spell_engine.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.spell_engine.arcane_blast.descript: Blasts the target, causing {damage} arcane damage. Grants Arcane Power, stacking up to {effect_amplifier} times.
spell.spell_engine.arcane_beam.name: Arcane Beam
spell.spell_engine.arcane_beam.descripti: Channels a beam of energy, dealing {damage} arcane damage every second. Consumes Arcane Power.
spell.spell_engine.fireball.name: Fireball
spell.spell_engine.fireball.description: Launches a ball of fire, causing {damage} fire damage.
spell.spell_engine.fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
spell.spell_engine.fire_breath.descripti: Incinerates targets in front, dealing up to {damage} fire damage every second.
spell.spell_engine.fire_meteor.name: Meteor
spell.spell_engine.fire_meteor.descripti: Crashes a meteor on the target, causing up to {damage} fire damage within {impact_range} blocks.
spell.spell_engine.ice_lance.name: Ice Lance
spell.spell_engine.ice_lance.description: Launches a bolt of frost dealing {damage} frost damage and slowing the target on impact.
spell.spell_engine.frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
spell.spell_engine.frostbolt.description: Launches a ball of frost dealing {damage} frost damage and slowing the target on impact.
spell.spell_engine.frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
spell.spell_engine.frost_nova.descriptio: Launches a ball of frost dealing {damage} frost damage and slowing the target on impact.
